title: Dinnerbone：今天的快照将取消
author: ufof
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ufof 于 2015-9-9 06:37 编辑 
I think todays snapshot may be cancelled due to rain. And by rain I mean rain of fire. It's exploding. Badly. :(
Dinnerbone：今天的快照恐怕要因为下雨取消了。我指的雨是“火雨”。爆炸了，很不幸：(。



[groupid=546]Command Block Logic[/groupid]
